name: @gmoonc/cli
description: CLI do Goalmoon Ctrl (gmoonc): instalador e configurador.

scripts.build: tsup src/cli.ts --format cjs --no-splitting && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const f='dist/cli.cjs';fs.writeFileSync(f,'#!/usr/bin/env node\n'+fs.readFileSync(f))"
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run build
